data.name: The Last Hero Demo
data.detailed_description:
Many years ago, a brave hero defeated Rorudark, an evil wizard that tried to destroy the world. Rorudark was trapped in the depths of the world, but centuries later his anger and extreme power set him free, and how revenge Rorudark cursed all the animals and creatures in the world, which are now attacking people. Now our last hope is you, The Last Hero. Now go, defeat your enemies and Rorudark, and save the world!

This demo includes:
- 10 different levels in world 1!
- 3 items to be purchased in the shop!
- 2 enemies!
- Lots of obstacles, platforms, traps and challenges!
- An incredible and complete soundtrack, with awesome musics and sounds!
- An automated game saving system!
- A medium difficulty, fun and challenging to play!

data.short_description: The Last Hero is an incredible adventure for one player, in an immersive world: Defeat your enemies, go through challenging levels and save the world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHA
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
